title: 有没有单独令苦力怕爆炸不破坏方块的指令
author: 大南瓜丶
txt_content: 就苦力怕爆炸不破坏方块，像别的，比如凋零可以正常破坏方块

replies.author: wzx胖纸
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule mobGriefing false
你试试,不知道版本,所以可能没有用

replies.author: nn虾米nn
replies.txt_content: 开启爬行者爆炸不破坏地形指令：/gamerule mobGriefing true
单独开的话 你可以看一下帖子neverlag插件 单独creeper可以防爆+优化

https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
虽然上面说到1.8 但是我实测1.12也可以 不会影响村民

replies.author: 叶烨子
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 叶烨子 于 2020-4-10 10:00 编辑 

execute as @e[type=minecraft:creeper] run data modify entity @s {}.ExplosionRadius set value 0
放在循环、保持开启、的命令方块里
PS记得要常加载区块2、creeper还是有伤害的

replies.author: 怕一笑丶
replies.txt_content: 命令/gamerule mobGriefing true  就可以了

replies.author: Zheng_Hong_yuan
replies.txt_content:
按T打开聊天框，输入
/gamerule mobGriefing false

需要开作弊，没有开的话就这么办
按esc
选择对局域网开放
打开允许作弊
完成

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
高频以下指令:

关防爆（必须放在第一位）

/gamerule mobGriefing true

将所有苦力怕的爆炸半径改成0

/execute as @e[type=creeper] run data merge entity @s {ExplosionRadius:0}

同时给予所有普通苦力怕50级反胃效果和闪电苦力怕51级反胃效果

/effect give @e[type=creeper,nbt=!{powered:1b}] nausea 1 50 true

/effect give @e[type=creeper,nbt={powered:1b}] nausea 1 51 true

它们爆炸没有威力但是会产生粒子云，你就可以利用它们先开防爆，再制造有威力的苦力怕爆炸再关防爆

/execute as @e[type=area_effect_cloud,nbt={Effects:[{Id:9b,Amplifier:50b}]}] run gamerule mobGriefing false

/execute as @e[type=area_effect_cloud,nbt={Effects:[{Id:9b,Amplifier:50b}]}] at @s run summon creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0,powered:0}

/execute as @e[type=area_effect_cloud,nbt={Effects:[{Id:9b,Amplifier:50b}]}] run kill @s

/execute as @e[type=area_effect_cloud,nbt={Effects:[{Id:9b,Amplifier:51b}]}] run gamerule mobGriefing false

/execute as @e[type=area_effect_cloud,nbt={Effects:[{Id:9b,Amplifier:51b}]}] at @s run summon creeper ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:0,powered:1}

/execute as @e[type=area_effect_cloud,nbt={Effects:[{Id:9b,Amplifier:51b}]}] run kill @s
